actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A resolution commemorating the two-year anniversary of the Soviet crackdown in Tbilisi, Georgia, on April 9, 1989, and urging the Soviet Union to recognize the will of the Georgian people and the legitimacy of the March 31, 1991, referendum.

summary.text: Commemorates the two-year anniversary of the Soviet crackdown in Tbilisi, Georgia, on April 9, 1989. Urges the Government of the Soviet Union to recognize the will of the Georgian people and the legitimacy of the March 31, 1991, referendum.

titles.title: A resolution commemorating the two-year anniversary of the Soviet crackdown in Tbilisi, Georgia, on April 9, 1989, and urging the Soviet Union to recognize the will of the Georgian people and the legitimacy of the March 31, 1991, referendum.
